ValidationRule.description: If stage is 'Signed Awaiting Site Survey Approval' we need to lock the record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND($Profile.Name <> 'Sales Operations', $Profile.Name <> 'Sales VP', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator'), AND( OR(Text(StageName)='Signed Awaiting Survey Approval', Text(StageName)='Signed'), NOT(ISCHANGED(StageName)), NOT(ISCHANGED(isConverted__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Case_Created__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Opportunity is at 'Signed Awaiting Survey Approval' or 'Signed.' No change is allowed.
